alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Franklin (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 09 at 5:24PM EDT until July 09 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Clinton County in northern New York... Northeastern Franklin County in northern New York... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 524 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Merrill, Lyon Mountain, Churubusco, Chateaugay, Ellenburg Depot, Bryants Mill, Burke, Ellenburg, Earlville, Harrigan, Brainardsville, Ellenburg Center, Ellenburg Mountain, Standish, Chazy Lake, Wolf Pond, Burke Center, Alder Bend, Cannon Corners and Irona. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
